metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4751 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1331.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.13').
